get_output_width()

Get width of yacas output

get_xml_list_depth()

Matrix/vector: Vector: List without nested lists Matrix: List of Lists, but no futher nesting Cannot be based on x, as this must work for e.g. Eval as well. So need to be based on XML. List in yacas is "<OMS cd="list1" name="list"/>"
